ratings.comment: The Professor seemed poorly organized during this semester. The last few lectures were crammed full of new material with the professor speeding through them. Lab reports often have questionable wording and are almost impossible to do without TA assistance, which causes constant questions and deadline postponements.

It is very clear that this is the first time he has ever taught. He gave little to no feedback on anything. The labs were WAY too much work and very poorly organized. The labs and HWs were full of errors and obviously never proofread. We still have around a month left of class and he has stated that he has given up and is "wrapping the class up"
